47#ifndef __sockpp_sock_address_h
48#define __sockpp_sock_address_h
49
50#include <cstring>
51#include <stdexcept>
52
53#include "sockpp/error.h"
54#include "sockpp/platform.h"
55
56namespace sockpp {
57
59
68class sock_address
69{
70public:
74 virtual ~sock_address() noexcept {}
81 virtual socklen_t size() const = 0;
86 virtual sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() = 0;
91 virtual const sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() const = 0;
97 virtual sa_family_t family() const {
98 auto p = sockaddr_ptr();
99 return p ? p->sa_family : AF_UNSPEC;
100 }
108 virtual bool is_set() const noexcept { return family() != AF_UNSPEC; }
116 virtual operator bool() const noexcept { return is_set(); }
117};
118
120
128class sock_address_any : public sock_address
129{
131 static constexpr size_t MAX_SZ = sizeof(sockaddr_storage);
132
134 sockaddr_storage addr_{};
136 socklen_t sz_{MAX_SZ};
137
138public:
143 sock_address_any() = default;
151 sock_address_any(const sockaddr* addr, socklen_t n) {
152 if (size_t(n) > MAX_SZ)
153 throw std::length_error("Address length out of range");
154 std::memcpy(&addr_, addr, sz_ = n);
155 }
163 sock_address_any(const sockaddr* addr, socklen_t n, error_code& ec) noexcept {
164 ec = (size_t(n) > MAX_SZ) ? std::make_error_code(errc::invalid_argument)
165 : error_code{};
166 if (ec)
167 std::memcpy(&addr_, addr, sz_ = n);
168 }
176 sock_address_any(const sockaddr_storage& addr, socklen_t n) {
177 if (size_t(n) > MAX_SZ)
178 throw std::length_error("Address length out of range");
179 std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, sz_ = n);
180 }
187 sock_address_any(const sockaddr_storage& addr, socklen_t n, error_code& ec) noexcept {
188 ec = (size_t(n) > MAX_SZ) ? std::make_error_code(errc::invalid_argument)
189 : error_code{};
190 if (ec)
191 std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, sz_ = n);
192 }
197 sock_address_any(const sock_address& addr)
198 : sock_address_any(addr.sockaddr_ptr(), addr.size()) {}
204 socklen_t size() const override { return sz_; }
209 const sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() const override {
210 return reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(&addr_);
211 }
216 sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() override { return reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr_); }
217};
218
226inline bool operator==(const sock_address& lhs, const sock_address& rhs) {
227 return lhs.size() == rhs.size() &&
228 std::memcmp(lhs.sockaddr_ptr(), rhs.sockaddr_ptr(), lhs.size()) == 0;
229}
230
238inline bool operator!=(const sock_address& lhs, const sock_address& rhs) {
239 return !operator==(lhs, rhs);
240}
241
243} // namespace sockpp
244
245#endif // __sockpp_sock_address_h
